feed.title: Azahara, Marbella
feed.subtitle: Digital Guidebook for apartment in Azahara 1, Marbella.

entry.title: Welcome to Marbella
entry.content:
A warm welcome to our apartment in Nueva Andalucía. The apartment is located in the heart of the Golf Valley, on the sun coast in Spain.

All information regarding the apartment can be found in this digital guidebook.
The Wi-Fi network name is WiFi_OliveNet-A860A2 and the password is t3eAC77P.

We, who try to be here as often as possible, are Fredrik and Maddja – living in Stockholm, Sweden.
Don’t hesitate to ask any questions you might have during your stay. We will try to get back to you as soon as possible.
Please contact us using the email address azahara1.marbella@gmail.com.

We have created an Instagram account for the apartment and please tag us if you like azahara.marbella.
entry.summary: A warm welcome to our apartment in Nueva Andalucía. The apartment is located in the heart of the Golf Valley, on the sun coast in Spain.

entry.title: Getting here
entry.content:
Address

The apartment is located in the urbanization Azahara 1 and the address is Avenida Valle del Golf s/n.
Gate location on Google Maps

(the street numbers in Spain can be a bit strange: s/n stand for “sin número” - “without number” but the closest street number is 4 or 131. You can also try searching for “Azahara 1, Marbella”)

Finding the apartment

After the gate you turn left and proceed almost to the end of the street (about 150 meters).

To your right there is a green path beside the tree.

Down the stairs.

Up the stairs.

Along the corridor.

The aparment number is 23A

Taxi

We use Uber or Cabify.

Transfer from/to Malaga Airport

We have used a driver called Cristobal, who has a MB E-Class Estate (very comfortable and can fit up to 4 suitcases. You can reach him on Whatsapp in order to book your transfer.

We can also recommend a driver called Alejandro and you can reach him on Whatsapp.

Car rental

  • Marbesol
  • Centauro
  • Bruno’s
entry.summary: Address The apartment is located in the urbanization Azahara 1 and the address is Avenida Valle del Golf s/n. Gate location on Google Maps

entry.title: Check in / Check out
entry.content:
A company called Sunstars is helping us with the apartment and will handle the check in/out and keys.

When you arrive in Marbella, please go to their office to check in.
Opening hours are Monday to Sunday 10am until 6pm.

Their office is located in Aloha Pueblo about 150 meters from the apartment.
Urb Aloha Pueblo Plaza Los Naranjos, Local 6, 29660, Málaga, Spain
+34 617 75 22 01
www.sunstars.es

entry.title: General
entry.content:
House rules

  • No parties
  • No smoking
  • No pets
  • Silent hours between 22 - 07 (10pm - 7am)

Pool rules

Please read and respect the pool rules that is posted by the pool. Also, please do not use inflatables in the pool.
More info

Internet/Wi-Fi

The network name is WiFi_OliveNet-A860A2 and the password is t3eAC77P. (If you need to restart the router, it is located behind the tv).

Smart Home

The apartment is equipped with an iPad to control the smart home settings. The iPad is located on the wall in the entrance.

Cleaning service

Contact Sunstars regarding cleaning and all other issues.

Air condition

The apartment is equipped with central air condition that can be controlled using the iPad.

TV

The tv is connected to the router for streaming. There is also a HDMI-cable connected, on the right side, that can be used to stream from another device.

Loudspeaker

In a cabinet over the fridge is a chargeable JBL Xtreme bluetooth speaker.

Front door

In Spain, doors have a function that makes it impossible to open the door from outside if there already is a key in the lock from inside. So make sure you don’t leave the apartment with a key in the key lock from inside.

Terrace door

Please leave the key in the lock and make sure the door is locked when leaving the apartment.

Fire extinguisher

A fire extinguisher can be found in one of the cupboards on the terrace.

Parking

Free parking is available inside the urbanization and you can park in any spot, they are not reserved to a specific apartment/car.

Supermarkets / food

  • Mercadona
  • Mercadona
  • Supercor Exprés (open on Sundays)
  • La Carnicería Gallega (butcher)
  • Scandi Supermarket (Scandinavian foodmarket)
  • El Corte Ingles Puerto Banus (very nice supermarket located on street level)

Gate

The gate can be opened using the remote on one of the house keys. There are two buttons - one for the gate and one for the door. It is also possible to open the gate using the key card. From within the urbanization (on the side with the buildings, 20 meters from the gate) there is a button you can press to open the gate.
Gate location on Google Maps.

Intercom

The apartment has an intercom that can be used to remotely open the gates to the urbanization.
More info

Garbage disposal/recycling

There is a second exit from the urbanization and there you will find garbage bins for household waste, cardboard/paper, glas and containers. You can open the door using either the key card or the remote control.
Location on Google Maps.

Check in / Check out

A company called Sunstars is helping us with the apartment and will handle the check in/out, keys and cleaning.
More info

Power sockets

Some sockets are used by the smart home for lights, please use the other socket if your device doesn’t work.
entry.summary: House rules No parties No smoking No pets Silent hours between 22 - 07 (10pm - 7am)

entry.title: Floor plan
entry.content:
The apartment is a two bedroom apartment with a roof top terrace and consists of:

  • Living room
  • Terrace
  • Kitchen
  • Master bedroom
  • Guest bedroom
  • Bathroom
entry.summary: The apartment is a two bedroom apartment with a roof top terrace and consists of: Living room Terrace Kitchen Master bedroom Guest bedroom Bathroom

entry.title: Terrace
entry.content:
BBQ

Please read here about the bbq.

Washing machine

The washing machine is located on the terrace and a drying rack is located in the storage area on the terrace.

Storage area

Here you can store your luggage and there is also a old set of golf clubs you are welcome to use.

Parasol

Please make sure you don’t leave the parasol opened unattended - sometimes we have really strong winds blowing on the coast.

Shower

The outdoor shower has only warm water connected.

Hose

There is a garden hose that you can connect on the bottom tap of the shower.

Power sockets

Some sockets are used by the smart home for lights, please use the other socket if your device doesn’t work.

Fire extinguisher

A fire extinguisher can be found in one of the cupboards on the terrace.
entry.summary: BBQ Please read here about the bbq.

entry.title: Living room
Kitchen
entry.content:
The counter tops are a bit sensitive so please be careful with them and always use a cutting board.

Appliances

In the kichen you will find a large coffe machine, toaster, juice press, kettle, microwave oven.

Vacuum cleaner and cleaning equipment

You will find these items under the sink/in the cupboard to the right. Here is also a few basic tools and shopping bags.
entry.summary: The counter tops are a bit sensitive so please be careful with them and always use a cutting board.

entry.title: Bathroom
entry.content:
A hair dryer can be found in one of the cupboards.

Due to the high calcium concentration in the water in the area, sometimes the knob to adjust the temperature (the lower one) is quite hard to turn and will need a bit of force.
entry.summary: A hair dryer can be found in one of the cupboards.

entry.title: Washing machine
entry.content:
The washing machine is located on the terrace and a drying rack is located in the storage area on the terrace.
Detergent should be poured in the left most compartment (it can be a bit tricky so I would recommend using detergent pods that you instead put in with the clothes). The middle compartment is for softener. (The right one we have never used, probably pre-wash)

Here is a translation of the options, we have almost always used the setting Algodón or Lana and have no idea of what some of the other options are.

Spanish English
Algodón Cotton
Sintéticos Synthetics
Lana Woll (hand wash)
Rápido Quick
Nocturno Night
Limp. tambor Clean drum
Delicado Delicate
Edredones sintét. Synthetic quilts
Ropa oscura Dark clothes
Camisas Shirts
Antialergias Anti-allergy

To the right there is a touch display that is used to set temperature and some extra features. There is also the start/pause button. Press the temperature button to set the temperature and press Inicio to start the washing machine.

Spanish English
Inicio pausa + carga Start pause + charge

Instruction manual
entry.summary: The washing machine is located on the terrace and a drying rack is located in the storage area on the terrace. Detergent should be poured in the left most compartment (it can be a bit tricky so I would recommend using detergent pods that you instead put in with the clothes). The middle compartment is for softener. (The right one we have never used, probably pre-wash)
